ruleset.name: Error Prone
ruleset.description: Rules to detect constructs that are either broken, extremely confusing or prone to runtime errors.

rule.name: JspEncoding
rule.message: JSP file should use UTF-8 encoding
rule.description: A missing 'meta' tag or page directive will trigger this rule, as well as a non-UTF-8 charset.
rule.example:
Most browsers should be able to interpret the following headers:
<%@ page contentType="text/html; charset=UTF-8" pageEncoding="UTF-8" %>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type"Â content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
